## Introduction

```{r}
library(ggplot2)

DIL_1 <- read.table('data/DIL_1.csv', header=TRUE, stringsAsFactors=FALSE, sep=";", dec=",", row.names="Dosisname")

data <- data.frame(
x <- (1:14),
y <- DIL_1$Mittelwert
)

x
y
data

ggplot(data, aes(x, y)) + 
  geom_point() +
  geom_line() +
  expand_limits(y = c(75.0, 78)) +
scale_y_continuous(breaks = seq(75.0,78.0,0.5)) +
scale_x_continuous(breaks = 0:14) +  # fÃ¼r jedes x ein tick
geom_abline(intercept = 76.23, slope = 0, lty=2) + # horizontale Linie ohne Steigung, da slope = 0 
   annotate("text", x = 13.2, y = 76.1, cex =rel(4), label = "Boost constraint") +
  theme_classic() +
  theme(
  plot.title = element_text(color="red", size=14, face="bold.italic", family ="serif"),
  axis.text.x = element_text(margin = unit(c(2, 0, 0, 0), "mm"), family = "serif", size=rel(2)),
  axis.text.y = element_text(margin = unit(c(0, 2, 0, 0), "mm"), family = "serif", size=rel(2)),
  axis.title.x = element_text(margin = unit(c(3, 0, 0, 0), "mm"), family = "serif", size=rel(2)),
  axis.title.y = element_text(margin = unit(c(0, 4, 0, 0), "mm"), family = "serif", size=rel(2)),
  plot.margin = margin(0, 0, 0, 1, "cm"),
  axis.ticks = element_line(color = 'black', size = 0.5, linetype = 1), axis.ticks.length = unit(0.2, "cm"),
  axis.line = element_line(color = 'black', size = 0.3, linetype = 1)
   ) +
 xlab("Fraction") +
  ylab("Dose in Gray") 


```
